panels.description: List of endpoints that are queried by Prometheus.
panels.title: Status of all endpoints

panels.description: Running REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Versions at Site.
panels.title: Running Versions

alert.message: Failure to query Probe for REPLACEME_SITENAME
alert.name: Probe Success alert for REPLACEME_SITENAME

panels.description:
Probe query success, failure. 
1 - OK, Below 1 - Failure, see for more details below.
panels.title: Probe Success

panels.description: ICMP V4 Round Trip time from Prometheus hosts to REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Frontend.
panels.title: ICMP round trip time (V4)

panels.description: ICMP V6 Round Trip time from Prometheus hosts to REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Frontend.
panels.title: ICMP round trip time (V6)

alert.message: Certificates expire in less than a week for REPLACEME_SITENAME
alert.name: SSL Expiry alert for REPLACEME_SITENAME

panels.description: Left lifetime for SSL Certificate validity. It will raise an alarm once less than a week is left.
panels.title: SSL Expiry

panels.description: HTTP Connection timeline.
panels.title: HTTP Duration

alert.message: HTTP Query Status code error for REPLACEME_SITENAME
alert.name: HTTP Status Code alert for REPLACEME_SITENAME

panels.description: HTTP Return Code. 200 OK, Anything else - failure. In case of failure - it will alert.
panels.title: HTTP Status Code

panels.description: Individual Service Status for Site Frontend and all Agents.
panels.title: Service Status

panels.description: Individual REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Thread Runtime. Only for debugging purposes of stuck processes.
panels.title: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Threads Runtime

alert.name: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE LookUpService Not OK for REPLACEME_SITENAME

panels.description: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE LookUpService status over time. No data - Service runs normally. 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE LookUpService Not OK Status

alert.name: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE ProvisioningService Not OK for REPLACEME_SITENAME

panels.description: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE ProvisioningService status over time. No data - Service runs normally. 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE ProvisioningService Not OK Status

panels.description: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE SNMPMonitoring status over time. No data - Service runs normally. 1 - Service has failed for some reason. It will not alert as SNMP is not mandatory.
panels.title: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE SNMPMonitoring Not OK Status

alert.name: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Agent Not OK for REPLACEME_SITENAME

panels.description: All REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Agents' status over time. No data - Service runs normally. 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Agent Not OK Status

alert.name: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Debugger Not OK for REPLACEME_SITENAME

panels.description: All REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Debugger's status over time. No data - Service runs normally. 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Debugger Not OK Status

alert.name: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Ruler Not OK for REPLACEME_SITENAME

panels.description: All REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Rulers' status over time. No data - Service runs normally. 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Ruler Not OK Status

panels.description: All REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Component's statuses are grouped by hostname and service state (only Running correctly) over time. 1 - service runs normally. Below 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Component Status

panels.description: All REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Component's statuses are grouped by hostname and service state over time. 1+OK - service runs normally. Below 1 or not OK - Service has failed for some reason.
panels.title: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Component Status (NOT OK)

panels.description: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Frontend Memory statistics for all processes. Only for debugging purposes.
panels.title: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE FE Thread Memory Monitoring (VMS)

panels.description: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE Frontend Memory statistics for all processes. Only for debugging purposes.
panels.title: REPLACEME_SOFTWARE FE Thread Memory Monitoring (RSS)

alert.message: Not able to receive monitoring data for DTN for REPLACEME_SITENAME
alert.name: Not able to receive monitoring data for DTN for REPLACEME_SITENAME

panels.description: Checks if Prometheus is able to receive monitoring data for this specific Site DTNs. 1 means OK, 0 means failure.
panels.title: Able to receive monitoring data from DTNs
Network Status VSW (Not activated for REPLACEME_SITENAME)
Network Status VSW (Not activated for REPLACEME_SITENAME)

targets.expr: sum(irate(interfaces_rx_miss{sitename="REPLACEME_SITENAME", software="VPP"}[2m])) without (thread, index) * 100 / sum(irate(interfaces_rx_packets{sitename="REPLACEME_SITENAME", software="VPP"}[2m]) > 0) without (thread, index)

sum(irate(interfaces_tx_error{sitename="REPLACEME_SITENAME", software="VPP"}[2m])) without (thread, index) / sum(irate(interfaces_tx_packets{sitename="REPLACEME_SITENAME", software="VPP"}[2m]) > 0) without (thread, index)
